rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with wheelchair-accessible ramp and automatic door system.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space living area designed according to Kerala traditional aesthetics, with ample natural light and Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen, accessible via a broad pathway for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in storage, featuring Kerala-style woodwork.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with adjoining dressing area, designed for easy movement and compliance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact servant's quarters located on the ground floor to ensure accessibility; includes a small kitchenette.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
rooms.description: Area leading to a rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and leisure, with ramps ensuring wheelchair access.

openings.features: Large windows for natural light, designed in traditional Kerala style with wooden shutters.
Wide door openings for wheelchair access and easy movement
